Detailed Description

CUDA streams.

CUDA streams are used to keep track of asynchronous operations.

Noncopyable.

Member Function Documentation

bool cuda::Stream::query (  )  const

Query if all operations in the stream have completed.

Returns:
true if complete

Copy from device memory to host memory asynchronously.

Works only with page locked host memory.
